name: Potdemon
description:
Disclaimer

All demons contained within are a work of fiction, and any similarities to demons real or imagined are purely coincidental. Do not attempt to recreate any rituals contained within.

Armed with your Demonomicon and a capture pot, you have opened a portal to a quiet part of the demon world to explore. Scan and capture demons with your devices, but gathering demons can bring its own risks...

Instructions

WASD - Move character

Shift - Sprint

Left Click - Use Demonomicon

Right Click - Zoom

Tab - Switch between scan and capture modes

1 - Cycle through previously scanned demons

2 - Toggle viewing a demon's form and its information

3 - View the inside of your Capture Pot

This game was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 40, with the theme The More You Have, The Worse It Is.

Demons inspired by ctrlcreep's inconvenience demons.
